text: Hi everyone :wave::skin-tone-3: We've got a <https://developers.HubSpot.com/blog/a-developers-recap-of-inbound-2024|new INBOUND recap blog> for y'all :slightly_smiling_face: The dev community presence was amazing this year, and I had such a wonderful time meeting y'all. Thanks to everyone who attended the community lightning talks, both in-person and online. It was one of my favorite events!
